overview: Every boy reaches a point in their lives when it’s time to become a man – which in the case of these four horny rookies – Elijah Rock, Jimmy Jefferson, David Mannix and Carl Sagan – means having sex with another guy in front of the cameras for the very first time. And whilst they might all be just a little shy and demur at first, rest assured that their tutors – Navon Raffi, Beno Eker and Colin Horner – soon have these young, tender sweethearts blooming into something way filthier. No question about it, guys, these boys are innocents no longer!
title: Cumming of Age
